name: Citadel - Flags of a Future Rebellion
description:
Negative Time landscape / digital folklore artefact


Multiple space/time-lines and perspective views reconstructed in a single landscape image that is part painting, part aerial cartography or folk map, and part tattered flag/sigil. A future digital folklore artefact. Continuing ancient folk art traditions used to pass on information & myth across space and time.

Created by hybrid generative/manual-generative method, where i insert myself into the loop of a generative process taking over some parts of the function to better control and guide the artwork. Unlike other Negative Time landscapes, these pieces were created native for crypto/multiverse space using virtual/generative landscapes as the starting point.


February 2021
